walks.title: Northumberland Legends Walk
walks.description: Explore the supernatural tales of Northumberland's ancient castles and mysterious landscapes

waypoints.instruction: Start at Bamburgh Castle. Look for the grey stones of the ancient fortress.
Travel south to Penshaw Monument. Follow the winding path to the hilltop.

walks.title: Mystical Creatures of the Countryside
walks.description: Journey through ancient woodlands and boglands to discover tales of magical beings

waypoints.instruction: Begin at the ancient oak tree. Listen for whispers in the wind.
Follow the wooden boardwalk across the marshland. Watch for dancing lights.
